title: Valar Rereadis: The Hedge Knight
description:
We begin with a discussion of the current setting in Westeros, the life of an orphan from Flea Bottom, the difference between a hedge knight and a sellsword, how funerals and death bookend this story and the entire Dunk & Egg cycle, plus quite a bit more.

Featuring the return of Sean of House Beard!
